Reaction.description: Represents an emoji reaction to an Announcement.

properties.description: The emoji used for the reaction. Either a unicode emoji, or a custom emoji's shortcode.
properties.name: name
count
properties.description: The total number of users who have added this reaction.

properties.name: me
properties.description: If there is a currently authorized user: Have you added this reaction?

properties.name: url
properties.description: If the reaction is a custom emoji: A link to the custom emoji.

properties.name: static_url
properties.description: If the reaction is a custom emoji: A link to a non-animated version of the custom emoji.

properties.name: id

properties.name: id
properties.description: ID of the scheduled status in the database.
The timestamp for when the status will be posted.

params
properties.description: The parameters that were used when scheduling the status, to be used when the status is posted.

properties.description: Text to be used as status content.
Poll to be attached to the status.
properties.name: params[poll]

properties.description: The poll options to be used.
properties.name: params[poll][options[]]
params[poll][expires_in]
properties.description: How many seconds the poll should last before closing.
Whether the poll allows multiple choices.
properties.name: params[poll][multiple]

properties.description: Whether the poll should hide total votes until after voting has ended.
properties.name: params[poll][hide_totals]

properties.description: IDs of the MediaAttachments that will be attached to the status.
properties.name: params[media_ids]

properties.description: Whether the status will be marked as sensitive.
properties.name: params[sensitive]

properties.description: The text of the content warning or summary for the status.
properties.name: params[spoiler_text]

properties.description: The visibility that the status will have once it is posted.
properties.name: params[visibility]
params[in_reply_to_id]
properties.description: ID of the Status that will be replied to.
The language that will be used for the status.
properties.name: params[language]

properties.description: ID of the Application that posted the status.
properties.name: params[application_id]

properties.description: When the status will be scheduled. This will be null because the status is only scheduled once.
properties.name: params[scheduled_at]
params[idempotency]
properties.description: Idempotency key to prevent duplicate statuses.
Whether the status should be rate limited <!-- TODO: What does this mean -->.
properties.name: params[with_rate_limit]

properties.description: Media that will be attached when the status is posted.
properties.name: media_attachments

ScheduledStatus.description: Represents a status that will be published at a future scheduled date.

{
   "scheduled_at" : "2022-09-29T00:00:00.000Z",

      "language" : null,
      "spoiler_text" : null,
      "visibility" : null,
      "sensitive" : null,
      "text" : "test post",
      "idempotency" : null,
      "scheduled_at" : null,
      "media_ids" : null,
      "application_id" : 3,
      "poll" : null
   },
   "media_attachments" : [],
   "id" : "1"
}

Announcement.name: Announcement
Announcement.description: Represents an announcement set by an administrator.
Announcement.exampleJson:
{ "mentions" : [], "content" : "

Looks like there was an issue processing audio attachments without embedded art since yesterday due to an experimental new feature. That issue has now been fixed, so you may see older posts with audio from other servers pop up in your feeds now as they are being finally properly processed. Sorry!

", "all_day" : false, "read" : true, "statuses" : [], "published_at" : "2020-07-03T01:27:38.726Z", "ends_at" : null, "updated_at" : "2020-07-03T01:27:38.752Z", "reactions" : [ { "static_url" : "https://files.mastodon.social/custom_emojis/images/000/067/715/static/fdba57dff7576d53.png", "me" : false, "url" : "https://files.mastodon.social/custom_emojis/images/000/067/715/original/fdba57dff7576d53.png", "name" : "bongoCat", "count" : 9 }, { "url" : "https://files.mastodon.social/custom_emojis/images/000/098/690/original/a8d36edc4a7032e8.png", "name" : "thonking", "static_url" : "https://files.mastodon.social/custom_emojis/images/000/098/690/static/a8d36edc4a7032e8.png", "me" : false, "count" : 1 }, { "count" : 1, "name" : "AAAAAA", "url" : "https://files.mastodon.social/custom_emojis/images/000/071/387/original/AAAAAA.png", "me" : false, "static_url" : "https://files.mastodon.social/custom_emojis/images/000/071/387/static/AAAAAA.png" }, { "name" : "", "me" : true, "count" : 1 } ], "starts_at" : null, "id" : "8", "tags" : [], "emojis" : [] }

{
   "image" : null,

   "author_url" : "",
   "embed_url" : "",
   "width" : 0,
   "html" : "",
   "author_name" : "",
   "height" : 0,
   "description" : "When Peter Teichs money went to another Barclays customer, the bank offered 25 as a token gesture",
   "provider_url" : "",
   "url" : "https://www.theguardian.com/money/2019/dec/07/i-lost-my-193000-inheritance-with-one-wrong-digit-on-my-sort-code",
   "provider_name" : ""
}

Account.name: Account
Account.description: Represents a user of Mastodon and their associated profile.

properties.name: id
properties.description: The account id.

properties.name: username
properties.description: The username of the account, not including domain.

properties.name: acct
properties.description: The Webfinger account URI. Equal to `username` for local users, or `username@domain` for remote users.

properties.name: url
properties.description: The location of the user's profile page.

properties.name: display_name

properties.name: note

An image icon that is shown next to statuses and in the profile.
properties.name: avatar
avatar_static
properties.description: A static version of the avatar. Equal to `avatar` if its value is a static image; different if `avatar` is an animated GIF.

properties.name: header
properties.description: An image banner that is shown above the profile and in profile cards.
A static version of the header. Equal to `header` if its value is a static image; different if `header` is an animated GIF.
properties.name: header_static
locked
properties.description: Whether the account manually approves follow requests.
Additional metadata attached to a profile as name-value pairs.

properties.description: Custom emoji entities to be used when rendering the profile.

bot

Indicates that the account represents a Group actor.

properties.description: Whether the account has opted into discovery features such as the profile directory.
properties.name: discoverable
noindex
properties.description: Whether the local user has opted out of being indexed by search engines.

properties.name: moved
properties.description: Indicates that the profile is currently inactive and that its user has moved to a new account.

properties.name: suspended
properties.description: An extra attribute returned only when an account is suspended.
An extra attribute returned only when an account is silenced. If true, indicates that the account should be hidden behind a warning screen.
